name: Spiral
description: Spiral scans customer support data like emails and online chats and detects emerging problems before they escalate.

technologies.name: React
technologies.description: React (also known as React.js or ReactJS) is a JavaScript library that makes developing interactive user interfaces simple.

technologies.name: Python
technologies.description: Python is a dynamically-typed garbage-collected programming language developed by Guido van Rossum in the late 80s to replace ABC. Much like the programming language Ruby, Python was designed to be easily read by programmers. Because of its large following and many libraries, Python can be implemented and used to do anything from webpages to scientific research.

technologies.name: GraphQL
technologies.description: GraphQL is a data query language developed by Facebook. It provides an alternative to REST and ad-hoc webservice architectures. It allows clients to define the structure of the data required, and exactly the same structure of the data is returned from the server. It is a strongly typed runtime which allows clients to dictate what data is needed.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: TypeScript is an open source programming language developed by Microsoft and first released in 2012. It is designed to add type safety to JavaScript while conforming as closely as possible to the syntax and semantics of the ECMAScript standard.

challenge:
Spiral is an online Project Management that Work backwards from the customer
 and Think from the customer’s perspective.
Develop a fast & responsive Single Page App in React as well as support the development of the existing backend in Python
Provide support in throught the way
The web application and the backend had to be well tested and stable
result: Within a few clicks, project manganers can monitors and executes decision in no Time
results: It helps formed decisions lead to better and faster results
The platform provides Delivery of products to customers and celebrate there success as they create it.

Our collaboration with Spiral is almost at 1 year anniversary and
 ongoing

name: allstacks
description: Allstacks gives software organizations clear visibility into project status, team performance, and trends so you can eliminate surprises in software delivery.

technologies.name: Vue.js
technologies.description: Vue is a JavaScript framework for building websites. The intent of Vue is to make the integration of other JavaScript libraries easy. It is designed to organize and simplify web development.

technologies.name: Python
technologies.description: Python is a dynamically-typed garbage-collected programming language developed by Guido van Rossum in the late 80s to replace ABC. Much like the programming language Ruby, Python was designed to be easily read by programmers. Because of its large following and many libraries, Python can be implemented and used to do anything from webpages to scientific research.

technologies.name: Django
technologies.description: Django is a web application framework for Python. It is designed to prioritize principles of reusability and rapid development.

technologies.name: PostgreSQL
technologies.description: PostgreSQL is a database management system that is object-relational. PostgreSQL originated from the Ingres project at the University of California, Berkeley.

name: hourstack
description: HourStack is the time tracking and scheduling tool which is Designed for teams of all sizes that care about tracking time across the applications they already use, but flexible enough to use as a stand-alone tool.

technologies.name: React
technologies.description: React (also known as React.js or ReactJS) is a JavaScript library that makes developing interactive user interfaces simple.

technologies.name: Node.js
technologies.description: Node.js is a tool for executing JavaScript in a variety of environments. JavaScript had humble beginnings as a language that lived only in web browsers, but the Node.js project has expanded its reach and helped make it the most popular programming language in the world.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that's particularly suited for server-side web development. PHP runtime is generally executed by webpage content, and can be added to HTML and HTML5 webpages. PHP was originally developed in 1994 by Rasmus Lerdorf.

technologies.name: MySQL
technologies.description: MySQL is an open source relational database management system. Based in Structured Query Language (SQL), MySQL can run on most platforms and is mainly used for web-based applications. It is written in C and C++.

name: billflow
description: billflow is a lightweight front-end layer on top of Stripe Billing, allowing you to continue using the power of  Stripe APIs & docs for advanced use.
